title: Who are the leading attorneys specializing in discharging college loans in bankruptcy due to borrower disability?
question: My college loans have been in default since 1995. One of my private graduate school loans even went to judgment. In 1996, I was diagnosed with a mental illness and have never worked consistently nor been able to pass by professional licensing exams.
answers:
I am very sorry for you, but I know of no lawyer who can help you. Any student loan guaranteed by the goverment cannot be discharged in BR. Every lawyer knows that so no one will take your case,since they will not be able to get for you what you need. I suggest you discuss your issue with the local legislative aide to your Congressman since until the BR laws are changed, nothing can be done to help you.
